body: Yes I confirm that too. there is no way to get all the issues open/close ones

issue.title: Implement "List issues for a repository" API

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

body: When will we have the we have the new release with the fixing issue

@cvrebert it seems you were too hurrying. This issue is not yet considered to be either bug or enhancement, no developer is assigned to it and usually issues should be fixed by another person (take a look at our [Principles of Bug Tracking](http://www.yegor256.com/2014/11/24/principles-of-bug-tracking.html))
@yegor256 do we recognize this issue as a bug/enhancement? If yes, can we assign @cvrebert to this issue?
Yes I recognize this issue as a enhancement?
yes, looks like a bug to me, we'll fix it
let me know when #1030 is merged and I'll release a new version of the library to Maven Central
we will find someone to do this task, soon
@rultor please don't close the issue, ask @cvrebert to do this instead, since he is the author of it
